participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Playful and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and challenges.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i like donuts. i play a lot of call of duty. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and quirky, with a passion for literature and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: i do not care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes.

content.text: What are u doing at weekend?
